body: # Support referencing webpages as additional context This PR introduces a new feature that enables users to include webpage references for additional context in their chat sessions. Key enhancements: - Users can now add links to documentation or relevant webpages within the current chat session - Two methods for adding references: 1. Directly through the chat dialog (see image below) 2. Via the settings menu (Tools > CodeGPT > Documentations) Please note: This functionality is currently available only through the CodeGPT API.
